quiz_item.error_analysis: 易因形近词“resolve”（解决）混淆词义，或词根“solv”（松开）过度推导为“消散”
quiz_item.sentence: Please wait until the tablet **dissolves** completely in the glass of water before drinking.

option.definition: 解决（to find a solution to a problem）
溶解（to become part of a liquid and no longer be seen）
融化（to turn from solid to liquid by heat）
